markdownRemark.excerpt: So I’ve finally moved over to Gatsby for my blog platform with the gatsby-starter-blog. I decided not to migrate across the old pages, given the page views were…
markdownRemark.html: So I’ve finally moved over to Gatsby for my blog platform with the gatsby-starter-blog. I decided not to migrate across the old pages, given the page views were relatively low and very outdated! But if you really want to find them, look here.

frontmatter.title: New Blog
frontmatter.description: My new blog! Please contact me if you'd like any of my old blog posts
